page.title: 04THE VILLAGE HALL, FAIRWARP
page.content: The village hall in Fairwarp is a large wooden hut with a stage at one end, with curtains. A small kitchen is by the side. The hall can be used for entertainment or lessons. The village fete raises funds for the hall. We went there to see The Wind in the Willows and I enjoyed it. The village hall can also be used for Women's Institute and for playgroups. The hall is often used for parties. People go there for different meetings such as The Forest Club. Nearby is a nature reserve. Some people go there to meet their friends. People have Yoga lessons there too. There is a space for the cars outside.
